name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) Event message - Check event message for invalid Keyword
id: stories/site/widgets/EventDiscoveryWidget.story;(/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) Event message - Check event message for invalid Keyword

testSteps.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
When search events by keyword {ABRAKADABRA} on Event Discovery Widget page
Then the event message is shown "Here other options for you."

children.description: Check that event message is shown: Here other options for you.

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites
